author: breser
msg: * CHANGES: Set date for 1.7.12 as 27 Aug 2013.

author: breser
msg: Fix packed revprop file splitting logic in FSFS
Modifying revprops may result in the loss of revprops for one
I added r1515534 to the branch as an obvious fix.

author: breser
msg: Fix symlink attack on svnpubsub's pidfile. Pick up r175 from upstream
trunk has a full upgrade of daemonize.py. this is just the pidfile fix.

author: breser
msg: Add swig_diff target to the __SWIG_PERL__ and __SWIG_RUBY__ targets in
These targets should build all swig modules for the language.

author: breser
msg: Merge the r1507889 group from trunk:
davautocheck: use the correct apxs binary by default.
Convenience aside, without this patch, davautocheck would use the wrong
apxs binary when invoked "by hand" (not via make).
